texasholdem

Class PokerTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • texasholdem.PokerTools

  • public class PokerTools
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static values used in a Texas Holdem poker game. There are static convenience methods used in the game for retrieving card image files, and for using the grid bag layout.
    Author:
    John Wardell

      • getCardImage

        public static javax.swing.ImageIcon getCardImage(Card card)
        Uses the card to get the file for the image of the card.
        Parameters:
        card - the card for which the image is needed.
        Returns:
        the image of the card.

      • setGBC

        public static java.awt.GridBagConstraints setGBC(java.awt.GridBagConstraints gbc,
                                 int gridx,
                                 int gridy,
                                 int width,
                                 int height)
        This method makes it easier to use grid bag layout.
        Parameters:
        gbc - a reusable GridBagConstraints object.
        gridx - the x value for gbc.
        gridy - the y value for gbc.
        width - the width value for gbc.
        height - the height value for gbc.
        Returns:
        the GridBagConstraints set the the x, y, width, and height given.
